column1: #text=Today I decided to go grocery shopping .
#text=I made a list detailing what I needed to buy , then decided to go to the discount grocery store where I could get everything on my list in one stop .
#text=I drove to the store , and parked near the front .
#text=I grabbed a basket and went inside .
#text=The first thing I saw was the muffins that were on my list .
#text=They were by the front door , so I picked some out and put them in my basket .
#text=I also needed peanut butter , which was at the back of the store .
#text=I went to the back and chose my favorite peanut butter .
#text=The last thing I needed was bread .
#text=I walked down the middle of the store looking down each aisle to see if I saw anything that I forgot to put on my list .
#text=I did n't see anything I needed , but had to resist the temptation to buy some ice cream .
#text=Once I got to the front of the store , I picked out a loaf of bread and went to stand in line to check out .
#text=It was busy , but a new line was just opening up , so I was able to get near the front of the line .
#text=The cashier rang me up and I paid with my debit card .
#text=I put my groceries in a paper bag .
#text=Then I left the store and drove home .
